Disk
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 1 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Disk
By Anonymous on Saturday, March 20, 2004 - 01:08 pm:

Can we find Disk (disk/disk) from CD? if not how do we make it?

By John Hawley on Saturday, March 20, 2004 - 03:21 pm:

We have never had a credible report of a Disk from CD. The easiest way we know to get a pure Disk is to combine two of the Rares that are available on CD. Yes, it can be two of the same Rare as it will only return a pure when combining two rares in MR1.

By Anonymous on Sunday, March 21, 2004 - 11:47 am:

Any kind of rare monsters that are available on CD? Or it has to be 2 gooaaals or 2 radials combined together?

By Lisa Shock on Sunday, March 21, 2004 - 10:22 pm:

It works best with two Disk/??? monsters, that way you have 100% chance of getting a Disk baby. If you use a Disk/??? with any other monster, rare or not, your percentage will be lower, meaning you may have to reset or try other weeks to get the Disk to be the outcome.

By Anonymous on Monday, March 22, 2004 - 05:12 pm:

Thanks a lot
